title: 205 - The Birth of Bono Campbell
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a full hause of characters, who start off discussing a rather hot office topic, Bill’s latest lunch(es). Some house cleaning updates follow including Mitt’s golf training, and Connor’s latest interaction at the local grocery. Next the boys jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things from the internet. Todays FOD includes the return of Lucas Lagoons, final season of peaky blinder preview, ended the “more wheels or doors?” debate, and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
